scripts.build-api: babel api --out-dir dist/api && babel index.js --out-file dist/index.js
scripts.build-production: npm run clean-build && npm run build-production-client && npm run build-api && npm run build-common
scripts.dev:
cross-env NODE_ENV=development webpack-dev-server --progress --host 0.0.0.0 & 
 npm run start-dev
scripts.lint: ./node_modules/.bin/eslint --fix config/webpack.*.js client/**/*.js api/**/*.js bin/**/*.js test/**/*.js common/**/*.js
scripts.start-dev: cross-env NODE_ENV=development nodemon index.js --config config/nodemon.json --exec 'npm run lint && babel-node'
scripts.test: npm run test:unit && npm run test:ui
scripts.test:unit: npm run test:api:unit && npm run test:common:unit && npm run test:client:unit
